text: Hans Wilhelmsson, (February 14, 1936 â€“ January 5, 2004) was a Swedish speed skater. In club competitions, he represented IF Castor. Outside his sporting carrier, he worked as a car salesman, insurance-person and bank director. ==Merits== *Olympic fourth place, 1960 ==Awards== *Sports performance of the year - 1960 == References == Category:2004 deaths Category:Swedish speed skaters Category:1936 births
